welcome.title: Welcome to maasroti!
welcome.subtitle: Let's capture the essentials so your dashboard feels personal from the very first visit.
welcome.description: This system will help you manage and track your maaser (tithing) in a simple and organized way.
welcome.note: All of the answers can be updated later—this is just a quick start so you're never looking at an empty screen.

explainDashboard.title: Dashboard - Complete Overview
explainDashboard.subtitle: Let's explore the dashboard - where you'll see all important information at a glance.
explainDashboard.description: The dashboard is your control center for maaser. Here you'll see your maaser balance, monthly and yearly progress, and all the important information you need to manage your donations wisely.

overview.title: Complete Overview
overview.description: Quick snapshot of all your income and donations, with automatic calculations of balances and obligations.

balance.title: Maaser Balance
balance.description: The system shows you exactly how much you've donated and how much more you need to donate to cover your maaser.

monthly.title: Monthly Tracking
monthly.description: View details by month - what were the income, donations and balance each month.

progress.title: Progress and Trends
progress.description: Charts and metrics showing your progress over time and identifying trends.

explainIncome.title: Income Page - Track Income
explainIncome.subtitle: Learn how to manage and track all your income.
explainIncome.description: The income page allows you to record and track all your income sources - salary, self-employment, investments and more. The system automatically calculates how much maaser to give from each income.

sources.title: Track Income Sources
sources.description: You can record income from all sources - work, business, investments and more. The system tracks each source separately.

types.title: Different Income Types
types.description: Fixed income (monthly), one-time income, or income over several months. Each type is handled appropriately.

tracking.title: Automatic Maaser Calculation
tracking.description: The system automatically calculates 10% (or another percentage you set) from each income, and updates your maaser balance.

explainDonations.title: Donations Page - Manage Donations
explainDonations.subtitle: Understand how to manage all donations and commitments.
explainDonations.description: The donations page allows you to track all your donations - recurring, one-time or installments. The system tracks each commitment and shows you what still needs to be paid.

recurring.title: Recurring Donations
recurring.description: Donations that repeat every month automatically. Ideal for organizations you donate to regularly.

installments.title: Installment Donations
installments.description: Commitments to donate over several months. The system tracks the number of payments remaining.

oneTime.title: One-Time Donations
oneTime.description: Donations made once. Suitable for special donations or emergency situations.

explainFeedback.title: Feedback Page - Help Us Improve
explainFeedback.subtitle: We want to hear from you and improve continuously!
explainFeedback.mainMessage: It's important to us to improve all the time, so if you have new ideas to improve the system or you found any bug in the system, we'd be happy if you send us feedback so we can work on it and keep improving.
explainFeedback.encouragement: Every feedback, suggestion, or bug report helps us improve the system and make it better for you!

setupIncome.title: Income Setup
setupIncome.subtitle: Choose your base currency and get a quick checklist for recording incomes.

recurring.title: Recurring salary or stipend
recurring.body: Use the recurring option for anything that repeats every month. The dashboard will treat it as your base income.

limited.title: Limited series (bonuses, projects)
limited.body: Pick "Limited months" when income only lasts for a few months so the system can stop counting it automatically.

oneTime.title: One-time earnings
oneTime.body: Record occasional payments as one-time income to keep your monthly totals accurate.

setupDonations.reminder: You can always add or edit donations later. Start with the most important commitments so the dashboard is meaningful from day one.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Quick answers to popular questions to help you get the most out of the system.

pricing.a: Yes. Maasroti is completely free and non-profit. In the future we may add optional advanced features without affecting the free core.

privacy.q: How do you protect privacy and data?
privacy.a: We use industry-standard security practices, store only what’s needed, and never share personal data with third parties unless required by law or with your consent.

howItWorks.q: How does it work in short?
howItWorks.a: You record income and donations. The system calculates the required maaser, tracks coverage, and shows a clear monthly/yearly snapshot.

maaserCalc.q: How is the maaser amount calculated?
maaserCalc.a: By default it’s 10% of net income. You can change the percentage in Settings. The system computes automatically and shows surplus or debt.

donationsTypes.a: One-time, recurring (monthly), installments (fixed count), and limited/unlimited length. Each shows status and progress.

installments.a: Set the total number of payments and how many were completed. The system tracks progress and knows when the commitment ends.

multiCurrency.a: A single base currency (ILS or USD) is used for calculations. Entries in a different currency are marked as converted using the fixed rate from Settings.

carryOver.a: Choose in Settings whether to reset the balance at the start of the new civil year or carry surplus/debt into the next year.

notifications.a: Yes. You can receive reminders about ending donations, accumulated debt, and a monthly summary. No spam and you can disable anytime.

account.q: Do I need an account to use it?
account.a: Yes. An account securely stores your data and lets you access it from any device.

feedback.q: How can I suggest an improvement or report a bug?
feedback.a: Use the 'Send feedback' link in the main menu. We appreciate ideas and reports to make the system better.
